Package rendering.textLines

Class TextLineRenderer

java.lang.Object
rendering.textLines.TextLineRenderer
public class TextLineRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
Controls rendering lines of "formatted text", such as inside flowchart text boxes and the CodeWindow's TextBox.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private TextLineShader shader

  • Field Details

    • shader

      private TextLineShader shader

  • Constructor Details

    • TextLineRenderer

      public TextLineRenderer()
      Creates a new TextLineRenderer. Initializes a TextLineShader to control the shader with will be used to render on the GPU and intitializes a local ZoomTranslateMatrix which is updated every render call.

  • Method Details

    • renderToScreen

      public void renderToScreen​(TextLineController textLineController, FlowchartWindowController flowChartWindowController, CodeWindowController codeWindowController)
      Renders the formatted text lines used for lines of code
      Parameters:
      textLineController -
      flowChartWindowController -

    • renderToImage

      public void renderToImage​(TextLineController textLineController, FlowchartWindowController flowChartWindowController)
      Renders the formatted text lines used for lines of code
      Parameters:
      textLineController -
      flowChartWindowController -

    • cleanUp

      public void cleanUp()
      Cleans up the memory of the TextLineShader. The TextLineShader has a GPU program used to render saved inside of GRAM. This will not be automatically cleaned up by the garbage collector so it must be deleted manually when this renderer will no longer be used.

    • prepare

      private void prepare()
      Sets the OpenGL state to be appropriate for rendering lines of formatted text.

    • renderText

      private void renderText​(TextWord text, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f windowPosition, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f windowSize, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix3f zoomTranslateMatrix)
      Renders a single GUIText onto the screen. Also accounts for what region of the screen clipping should be evaluated for.
      Parameters:
      text - the GUIText to be rendered. For a formatted "line of text" it is specifically a TextWord.

    • endRendering

      private void endRendering()
      Restores the OpenGL state for another renderer to be called.
